thread.title: Milan to hand a lifeline to Kevin Boateng in January
thread.title_full: Milan to hand a lifeline to Kevin Boateng in January

title: Milan to hand a lifeline to Kevin Boateng in January
text:
Sports News | 11 October 2015 19:40 CET Milan to hand a lifeline to Kevin Boateng in January - www.ghanasoccernet.com Kevin-Prince Boateng could be playing for AC Milan in January 
Italian Serie A giants AC Milan will hand a lifeline to suspended Ghana midfielder Kevin-Prince Boateng by handing him a contract in January, GHANAsoccernet.com understands. 
The 28-year-old has been training with the Rossoneris and played in their 3-0 friendly win over Monza on Thursday afternoon. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
